abstract.p: This cookbook is an introduction to fibre spectroscopy and, in particular, the techniques and software available for reducing fibre-spectroscopy observations. It covers the principal common-user instruments available to UK astronomers: the Anglo-Australian Telescope 2dF, WYFFOS/AUTOFIB2 on the William Herschel Telescope and FLAIR on the UK Schmidt. It is not a manual for any particular package, though it does contain some worked examples.
